first.name: Sand Kitten
first.content: Listen to me for a second!@I have something important to tell you!

repeat.content: Hey! There's something else you need to know!

random_0.content: My cousin told me that some of these lichen are over 5000 years old!

0_1.content: ...Will I look like a lichen when I'm that old?

random_1.content: Dr. Letharia seems a bit scary at first, but she's actually quite nice.

1_1.content: She even gave me a pair of sand-goggles for my birthday -

1_2.content: It came with a note, telling me to never travel alone.

random_2.content: Every single day my grandma makes me eat a bowl of Lichen soup.@That's why my eyes are green.

random_3.content: If you encounter a desert-tapeworm, don't even think about trying to kill it -

3_1.content: No matter how many times you defeat it, it will come back to bug you.
